content: No matter how much you have saved in fiat bank, it will not make you rich unless you invest. No investment is like Bitcoin investment. Both real estate, stocks, and gold cannot be compared to Bitcoin investment. There was an argument within my neighborhood, arguing about how risky crypto (Bitcoin investment) is. One thing for sure is, some folks don't get the point that fiat currency can be riskier than Bitcoin investment. The reasons are Inflation: causes the price of goods and commodities to add over time. I.e, buying a liter of fuel for $3.100 today and buying some fuel for $4.600 the next day. Economic instability: This can also make the government borrow money from different countries. However, if the economy is unstable, IMO many citizens will travel out and go to a better country with a stable economy. Also, if foreign investors leave the country, the currency will be valueless. Currency devaluation:[/by When a currency doesn't have a value, it can no longer afford things that cost that same amount months back. All this can cause fiat to lose value.  There are many reasons why it's very important to keep our money in Bitcoin as an investment. Bitcoin is decentralized: The decentralized nature of Bitcoin makes it very difficult for the government and the bank to have access to and control it. Can send Bitcoin anywhere/country on a cheaper rate: With Bitcoin, you can send money to any foreign country at your own comfort and on a cheaper rate. High return on investment: This is one of the most important reasons. If you invest in Bitcoin, you can make a 100% profit from it, mostly when you invest in the long term. Investing in Bitcoin will also give you the advantage of learning a skill, skills like trading and investment. IMO, with Bitcoin investment, you can also control your finances. Invest only $10,000 in Bitcoin for 5 years, and you will make decent profits from it, but when you keep the $10,000 in your bank account for 5 years, you cannot use it to buy what you will use the money invested in Bitcoin to buy because the fiat value has depreciated. But the $10,000 invested in Bitcoin will yield profits, and you can use it to buy what you want to buy.

comments.author: Odusko
comments.body: When you mean rich with Bitcoin it will be subjective because every individual has his or her unique realities in life, Bitcoin can make those that have a steady inflow of cash and are willing to take risks rich, in terms of alternative investment, yes Bitcoin is far better than any other Fiat investment like real estate and stock that you mentioned because of the impact of inflation and other economic crisis on those sectors, 10 years investment is enough time for your Bitcoin investment to materialize, DCA is a fruitful approach to achieving that but along the line be careful not to get distracted by shitcoins that may promise to give you that level of financial increase in just 1 week, there are scams, buy Bitcoin hold in your wallet with you seed phrase secured.

comments.body: It all depends on the individual mate. Bitcoin has the potential to make one rich if that person uses the right approach to it. In a country where the currency is stable, bitcoins riskier than holding fiat but fiat won't give you any profit.A $10k investment in Bitcoin wot make you rich in 5 years. comments.author: Questat
comments.body: Even if we have witnessed already how profitable bitcoin is, still the future of bitcoin remains uncertain. So we can’t tell completely that investing in bitcoin could guarantee us to become rich in the future. This is the reason why we don’t have to force ourselves to invest in bitcoin, it’s never a compulsory but only a voluntary one. However, if one decides to invest, it should be done using extra funds, not from using our hard-earned savings, so that if bitcoin suddenly loses its value in the future, our finances will never be greatly affected. DCA is a good and effective strategy, provided that you do it regularly regardless of the current price of bitcoin, and having risk management while you are still in the hodling process.

comments.author: SilverCryptoBullet
comments.body: Quote from: Su-asa on January 22, 2025, 04:46:40 PMThere are many reasons why it's very important to keep our money in Bitcoin as an investment.Bitcoin is decentralized:The decentralized nature of Bitcoin makes it very difficult for the government and the bank to have access to and control itAccess the blockchain and control it are different. Bitcoin blockchain is a public blockchain, with a public ledger, and everyone can acess it. Like you can run a Bitcoin full node, a Bitcoin prune node, a SPV wallet, and can still all access Bitcoin blockchain.Control it means you have 51% of its network hashrate at least.QuoteCan send Bitcoin anywhere/country on a cheaper rate:With Bitcoin, you can send money to any foreign country at your own comfort and on a cheaper rate.Bitcoin blockchain is for borderless transactions, and it's true that you can send it to any Bitcoin address, anywhere.But it does not always give Bitcoin users cheaper transaction fee. If Bitcoin mempools are overloaded, network is congested with overwhelming waiting transactions, there are fee rate race among Bitcoin users, and transaction fee will become more or very expensive.You can see there are spikes of very expensive transaction fees in Bitcoin history.https://bitinfocharts.com/comparison/bitcoin-transactionfees.html#alltime
